directions: Combine garlic scapes, olive oil, salt, and pepper in a bowl and turn to coat evenly. Marinate for 20 minutes.
Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat and lightly oil the grate.
Place garlic scapes on the grill and grill until well charred and tender at the thickest part, 1 to 2 minutes per side.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
title: Grilled Garlic Scapes
